bibl.title: Behind Masks: The Artists of Dionysos in Ptolemaic Cyprus.
bibl.note: Dionysiac artists in Cyprus and comments on their relations to the Ptolemaic court and ruler cult (in the light of Greek inscriptions).

bibl.title: Report of the Department of Antiquities, Cyprus

bibl.seg: Aristodemos Anastassiades, Behind Masks: The Artists of Dionysos in Ptolemaic Cyprus.
Dionysiac artists in Cyprus and comments on their relations to the Ptolemaic court and ruler cult (in the light of Greek inscriptions).
